content: when tried on this should be roughly at the end of your pinky toe you don t have to end with round 12 then work last round before the toe k2tog knit to marker sm knit to bor 1 st decrease d 64 sts in total continue with the toe @crochetedbybogusia - follow me on instagram so much fun stuff 3 instructions refer to charts at the end of this file toe i like a version of a wedge toe that is slightly longer than usual and has 4 sts between the decreases instead of the usual two - thank you @cnyttan cnottan for that inspiration feel free to substitute it for your preferred toe note if you re using shorties you ll have to change needles to magic loop/dpns at some point round 1 knit round 2 decrease round *k2 ssk knit to 4 sts before marker k2tog k2* sm repeat from * once more bor acts as 2nd marker repeat rounds 1 and 2 for 8 times in total for 32 sts in total 16 sts on each needle then repeat the decrease round 3 additional times for 20 sts in total 10 sts on each needle graft toe using the kitchener stitch i like this method to prevent the „ears from forming weave in the ends and you re done please tag me if you decide to share your finished pair of socks i m @crochetedbybogusia on instagram and yes my main things is crocheting - don t be alarmed i d love to see them @crochetedbybogusia - follow me on instagram so much fun stuff 4 charts texture chart written pattern round 1 *k 1 k2tog yo yo ssk k 1* repeat what s in ** to the end of round round 2 *k 3 k 1 tbl k 2* repeat what s in ** to the end of round round 3 *k2tog yo k 2 yo ssk* repeat what s in ** to the end of round round 4 *k 1 k 1 tbl k 2 k 1 tbl k 1* repeat what s in ** to the end of round round 5 knit round 6 knit round 7 *yo ssk k 2 k2tog yo* repeat what s in ** to the end of round round 8 *k 1 tbl k 5* repeat what s in ** to the end of round round 9 *k 1 yo ssk k2tog yo k 1* repeat what s in ** to the end of round round 10 *k 1 k 1 tbl k 2 k 1 tbl k 1* repeat what s in ** to the end of round round 11 knit round 12 knit alternatively you can change rnds 4 and 10 to round 4 knit round 10 knit this will result in a more open and lacy pattern @crochetedbybogusia 5 charts colorwork chart a @crochetedbybogusia 6 charts colorwork chart b there are long floats in the charts so i recommend using a technique called ladder-back jacquard
